card1.head: Lost in the Beauty of the Ocean
card1.data: There's nothing quite like the feeling of being by the ocean. The sound of the waves crashing against the shore, the salty smell of the sea air, and the vast expanse of the ocean itself can all make us feel small yet connected to something much greater than ourselves.
